mapper.insert: insert into tb_clazz (id, name, number, introducation, coordinator, email, telephone, grade_name, isdelete, cno) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_clazz set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introducation = #{introducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coordinator = #{coordinator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade_name = #{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT}, cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, number, introducation, coordinator, email, telephone, grade_name, isdelete, cno from tb_clazz where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, number, introducation, coordinator, email, telephone, grade_name, isdelete, cno from tb_clazz
